snippet: Late-night television’s Gen X hosts each has a strong social media presence and a vision for viral content that appeals to his own, and younger, generations.
abstract: Late night talk show hosts Jimmy Fallon, Jimmy Kimmel and Seth Meyers each have strong social media presence but rather different styles.
lead_paragraph: Late-night television’s Gen X hosts each has a strong social media presence and a vision for viral content that appeals to his own, and younger, generations.
